com.intel.cosbench.log.log4j
Class Log4jLogManager

java.lang.Object
  com.intel.cosbench.log.log4j.Log4jLogManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
LogManager
public class Log4jLogManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogManager

The wrapper of log4j LogManager, this log manager will create log file with maximum size of 10 MB, and the maximum number of backup file is 10. The default log level is INFO.

Author:
ywang19
